name: CART SURFER
description: Dude, I'm totally gonna get like 500 coins this time, says a penguin ripping down the track. I run through the cave and get sweet air with my 360s and backflips.

name: COFFEE SHOP
description: Many of our customers come here for some quiet while they read the latest newspaper, explains a staff member. Ballistic biscotti is our most popular menu item.

name: ASTRO-BARRIER
description: I remember when Astro-Barrier came out. It was the first arcade game on the island! recalls an avid gamer in the Lounge. Have you found the secret levels yet?

name: HOT CHOCOLATE
description: The trick to a great cup of coffee is the time it takes to pour, explains the Coffee Stop staff. Not too fast but not too slow, then save some room for marshmallows!
The landing pads around the island are built out of special alloys that disable them from being adversely affected by jet pack heat, explains Gary. That means they're strong.
First you start with the pizza dough, which gets flattened into pans, the chef continues. Then it goes down the Pizzatron 3000 line and roasts in the oven.

name: PAINT BY LETTERS
description: This one's my favorite story in the Book Room because it's about my favorite day of the year, he says. Besides, I love any story that involves aliens and flashlights.

name: MINE
description: The Mine is so cool. I can see all kinds of stalactites on the ceiling, explains the scientist. Stalactites are those things that look like icicles. Oh wait... they're just icicles.

name: red ones
description: It's amazing what you can do with a plain old drill, notes a worker on a job site near the coast. I've seen some nice red ones, but I like my trusty yellow drill. It does just the trick.

name: JET PACK ADVENTURE
description: I love going on adventures with my jet pack. I can almost navigate through the entire course without getting a single coin, boasts the proud pilot. It's not too easy, though...

name: FOREST
description: It's the perfect day for a hike in the Forest, says the penguin, holding her backpack on her shoulders. Keeping active is really important, plus I love the great outdoors!
When you've got a penguin who's stuck in the snow / Just tell 'em exactly where to go / To the Rescue Squad on top of the hill / We know how to help and ya know we will!

name: PET SHOP
description: This here is the puffle area, You'll be responsible for caring for these little critters, explains the Pet Shop owner. The black one over there is a bit of a firecracker.

name: SKI VILLAGE
description: I usually start a tour here at the Ski Village because it's so close to my tour booth, explains a tour guide. It's a great place to build a group of tourists, too.

name: SKI HILL
description: This must be the place she was talking about with all the sledding penguins, says the red penguin. Now what on earth is that pointy thing up there for?

name: SNOWBALL
description: Here comes a long one! one penguin shouts. Yikes! That was close! shrieks the other penguin. Guess I'm better with water balloons...

name: SNOW FORTS
description: I'm practicing my snowball pitch. I pretend this is the pitcher's mound, then wind up and let it fly. The Snow Forts are the perfect place to test out your pitching arm.

name: football
description: Okay, look. Let's get this straight. I know some penguins out west call it a soccer ball, but it's football. Now that you understand the game, ready to try and score a goal?

name: BEACH
description: I remember when the Beach opened as though it was yesterday, replies one island veteran. We threw a big barbecue with the fish we caught. Ahhh... those were golden days...

name: FOOTBALL
description: 10... 24... 5... hut! shouts the quarterback as he makes a run for it across the field, racing for the 10-yard line. Team Red's not gonna win it this time, he thinks as he's running...
BATTER UP! shouts the umpire as Team Red's pitcher readies the first throw of the big ball game. This one's for the Blue Team! shouts the batter as the ball flies towards the plate...
Welcome to my beautiful enchanted castle! beams the sparkly princess penguin. I'm looking for my wand, which I seem to have misplaced. Could you help me look for it?

name: BEAN COUNTERS
description: Why do they insist on delivering more fish?! exclaims the employee catching the order from the delivery truck. Is it just me or are there more fish than java bags here?

name: NEWSPAPER ARCHIVES
description: Sometimes I don't get a chance to read the newspaper, so I catch up with the past issues in the Boiler Room, says the lime green penguin. I don't want to miss any comics!

name: UNDERGROUND POOL
description: Hey, do you remember when there wasn't a pool in here? asks one of the penguins. I remember a party where we were dancing on the ground in this very spot!

name: coral crown thing
description: While Rockhopper travels at seas to find treasures, I prefer to search at home, the diver explains. See! Check it out! A coral crown thing! Diving totally rules.

name: ICE FISHING
description: I think the last time I was here, I caught about 10 fish, he replies. I'm not in a rush when I go fishing. To me, it's about fun, not finance. If I need coins, I help at the Pet Shop.
EVERYONE MAKE WAY FOR BOXMAN! shouts the penguin in the superhero mask. I shall put all evildoers into my superboxes for shipment to 'No More Bad Guys Land'!
The residents of Club Penguin appreciate a good anvil that's why so many are sent to the Coffee Shop every day. I'd say I make about 30 on a good day, replies one anvil smith.

name: HALLOWEEN
description: Check it out! I'm a ghost bunny professor! explains the orange penguin. I want to have the coolest costume for this solar eclipse party at my buddy's igloo. Do you think I'll win?
Let's pretend to be knights and princesses. I'll be the Knight of Light and you can be the Princess of Power, says the green penguin. Oh no! Here comes a dragon...

name: BLACK PUFFLE
description: Turbo is my black puffle. It rolls its eyes a lot, replies the penguin as he feeds his pet a flipper full of Puffle O's. It really gets fired up when I take it out for a walk.

name: MEDIEVAL PARTY
description: For this event we collaborated with Penguin Style's fashion designers to make an epic party, says one planner, dressed in a knight's garb. I still wear my party clothes today.

name: BLUE PUFFLE
description: As an employee, I value the blue puffles, replies the staff member. They are loyal, easy to take care of, and fun to play ball with. You can't go wrong with a blue puffle.

name: PINK PUFFLE
description: This is my pink puffle, Cutie! I named it that because I think its eyes are sooo adorable, continues the ballet dancer. Plus it matches my outfit!

name: GREEN PUFFLE
description: My puffle Greenie is the silliest puffle I've ever met, which is why we get along so well, she giggles. I love it when it plays on its unicycle it's so funny!
No igloo would be complete without accessories for your cute little puffle pets, the decorator explains. Puffles love having furniture just as much as penguins!

name: PURPLE PUFFLE
description: Oh! Look at that one over there blowing bubbles! That one is sooo cute it should be my pet, she exclaims. I'll name it Princess Purple because I love princesses and purple!

name: YELLOW PUFFLE
description: I knew I wanted a yellow puffle from the moment I saw it in the Forest at Halloween, she replies. My puffle Lemon likes to paint just like I do.

name: SUMMER PARTY
description: The Summer Party sticks out the most in my mind as the one to beat, proclaims one penguin. You can't top great buddies acting crazy and having fun.

name: GRAY FISH
description: You ain't gonna get a bite without the Flashing Lure, sonny, the experienced brown fisherman explains. Them gray ones are only attracted to real bright light.

name: O BERRY
description: These berries grow on shrubs in the forest clearing, explains our nature guide. Puffles love to eat them because of their tart sweetness.

name: LIFE RING
description: Having a life ring handy is really important to us, the lifeguard continues as she keeps watch over the Pool. Hey, that crab is knocking on the glass over there!
Arrr, this be the black flag atop me ship, growls Rockhopper as we tour the Migrator. I be liking to name things, so I be callin' this one the Jolly Roger.

name: COINS
description: Coins are the widely accepted monetary system around the island, explains the scholarly account penguin. That means penguins use them to buy stuff.

name: GARY THE GADGET GUY
description: I have been conducting research on the combustion of hydrogen and oxygen, Gary continues. Jet pack fuel is important on the island as it allows penguins to adventure.

name: BUOYS
description: I'm trying to find the elusive Boo-Eee #4, replies the penguin sleuth. They're hidden all over, and I think they're supposed to protect the island from bad weather or something.

name: YARR
description: Me beloved best buddy Yarr has been by me side e'er since we met on Rockhopper Island, the burly captain replies. It be a loyal friend, keepin' watch me Crow's Nest.

name: HERBERT P. BEAR
description: Why hello there, penguin. It is I, Herbert P. Bear, Esquire. Aren't you fortunate to have discovered my magnificent card. I am confident that you will treasure this picture.

name: HOT SAUCE
description: It is I, the alien Dojo master, hai ya! I will reveal to you the hidden ingredient of my pizza masterpieces... the amazing Hot Sauce guaranteed to spice up any dish!
I think it took like a day and a half to make this, recalls one snow artist. I don't really remember. I just know that we had to test to make sure penguins could walk on it.

name: AUNT ARCTIC
description: Hello! Aloha! Oi! I am so exhilarated to have my photograph taken for such a prestigious event. This is my desk, where I read the letters I receive and wrestle with writer's block.
Ooooh eee oooooh! sing the carolers as they practice their songs to serenade the town. During the holidays, the trees are trimmed with fresh snow and holiday cheer echoes throughout the island.

name: SECRET AGENT
description: One rule we have about being a secret agent is that you don't talk about secret agents, says the tight-billed penguin in the suit. No other comments at this time.

name: SNOW SHOVEL
description: I never go anywhere without my trusty shovel. I know a lot of penguins prefer their drills, but I get a sense of reward using my shovel to move the snow around.

name: THE MIGRATOR
description: Arrr mateys! Ye be gazin' at me good ship, the Migrator! It be a mighty ship of vim and vigor that has lasted many tumbles, replies Rockhopper. Nary a better boat there be.

name: CAPTAIN ROCKHOPPER
description: Arrr... ye be gazin' at me glorious card. Ahhhh, a sight for sore eyes this fantastic photo be. It be remindin' me of many voyages across the seas with treasures seized!

name: ICE CREAM
description: There I am eating ice cream at the Beach again! exclaims the penguin as she gets her beach towel ready. Yes, it's true, ice cream and the Beach are a great pair.

name: MULLET
description: Penguins from far and wide come to this ice fishing hole to see if they can catch this legendary big fish. Someone told me I need bigger bait though, so I brought a pizza.
Oh no! That crab over there tapped the glass and now there's a leak and there's water pouring out and there's going to be water everywhere what are we going to do now!?

name: FLUFFY THE FISH
description: Here fishy fishy fishy! calls the red penguin. I don't think Fluffy has ears, his friend replies. Neither do we, but I can hear you... Hmmm. Guess you've got a point there.

name: SHARK
description: I know there's a big fish down there, but I don't think it's that one with the great big mean teeth and shark fin on top, the rookie fisherman says. That's not Mullet, is it?

name: BLAST
description: Dude. Soooo love the shades. They make me even stronger and more silent. Maybe later we can hang out and I'll eat a Puffle O to entertain 'ya.

name: FLARE
description: You think this is fast? You should see how I move when I get shot from a cannon! It's a riot! And I think, actually, it increases happiness.

name: CHIRP
description: Paints, creativity, and music, Chirp replies with whimsy. Mix those together and you got a masterpiece, my friends, a masterpiece!

name: POP
description: I love bubbles! They're beautiful to blow. Bouncy. Breathtaking. Transparent perfection, I say!

name: LOOP
description: Hmm... I wonder if my lasso would work the same under water. I mean, it'd be super cool to see if I could round up some pearls, wouldn't it?

name: FLIT
description: Um, nope! Can't touch this propeller hat, Flit laughs loudly. It takes tons of practice... Even I need it! Recall Christmas 2008 when I got stuck sideways in a tree?!

name: BOUNCER
description: It's so cool to bounce around like my ball, he declares. By the way... it rolled under a ginormous pile of snow and though I'm small, round and can roll, I'm a bit too puffy. Can you help?

name: ED MCCOOL
description: Dear Gary, met two very talented puffles on an important PSA mission today. Will have to keep a look out for them in the future. They may be useful someday...

name: NIBLET
description: From this snowman emerges the almighty Niblet, the might green puffle! He's been trying to become a white puffle by hiding in the snow.
Penguins and puffles never get tired of the snow falling in Club Penguin. Best friends like to take some timeout from their busy life to watch it fall together.
Sometimes rounding up puffles feels a little like chasing a rainbow. Lots of colors, but the closer you get the farther away it seems.

name: KEEPER
description: Yeah, this little green guy is an epic win, Cadence grinned. He's got all the right moves. He usually knows where the party's at. He's definitely a Keeper, lolz!

name: GOLDEN PUFFLE
description: Such a popular myth, they made a Stage play about it. Does this puffle really live under the 'berg?
Swoosh, the mysterious meteor puffle flies through the air with the greatest of ease...

name: RAINBOW PUFFLE
description: A multi-colored legend, or just a creative little yellow puffle who has been playing with paint?

name: crab
description: I'm telling ya, it was huge! Twice the size of a penguin and it had claws like a crab. I was shaking in my snow boots!

name: Club Penguin Times
description: Extra! Extra! Every Thursday the Club Penguin Times delivers the latest scoop on everything that's happening on the island. From fun art to stories to games, there's something new every week!

name: Worms
description: Anyone who's planning to go ice fishing behind the Ski Lodge needs a can of worms. Having this squirmy bait ready is the first step to catching a fishy treat.

name: Martial Artworks
description: The Invisibility Suit is one of the tools of the ninja. Available only from the Martial Artworks store, it allows ninja to vanish into the shadows. Useful AND cool.

name: Penguin Mail
description: Through rain, sleet, and snow, the Penguin Mail will always get through. But mostly through snow... and actually they've never seen rain, but still.

name: Gift Shop
description: This is my favorite Halloween costume, the Bumble Bee! I picked this one up last year when they were on sale at the Gift Shop.

name: Pizzatron 3000
description: Making pizzas in the Pizza Parlor can be tricky. Chefs need a steady hand and concentration of steel to prepare pizza pies perfectly for all their hungry costumers!

name: Card-Jitsu
description: To become a ninja, one must first learn to master the elements. It all begins with Card-Jitsu, and this card you hold in your hand. Proceed to the Dojo, and take your first step on a legendary path...

name: Aqua Grabber
description: Puffles are the cute little furballs you see penguins waddling around with next to them. You can even take them into games like Aqua Grabber! Drop by the Pet Shop in the Plaza to adopt one of your very own.

name: Music Jam '08
description: This trendy outfit is popular for its sparkle and "pizzazz!" It was first released in the Gift Shop, just before Music Jam '08, one of the biggest parties of the year.
There's construction going on all over the place in Club Penguin all the time. Penguins on the island love to build and create, so construction is a pretty popular job around here!

name: Pins
description: These charming, limited edition collector's items are a must have for any treasure hunter... a brand new one is hidden every two weeks somewhere on the island!

name: Treasure Hunt
description: Rockhopper's Treasure Hunt game is kinda rare. You can only play it when his ship, the Migrator, is docked on the Beach. Remember, you need his key from that book to get into the Quarters on the ship.

name: DJ3K
description: DJ3K at the Night Club is a music-makin' penguin's favorite game. "It's simple, yo. Just start pushin' buttons and the groove kicks in. Every good beat needs a little cowbell, so I like to mix that into my sets."
The only thing you need to 'catch some waves' down at the Cove; penguins can borrow a board or buy their own at the Surf Shack. Then they just need to catch a 'gnarly' wave and 'hang ten!'
Chilling out at the Beach is even easier when the beach is made of snow. Sun glasses are optional, but you add that touch of cool while you chill.

name: Telescope
description: If you look through the telescope at the Beacon, you can see all the way out to sea. It's a good place to keep a close eye out for Rockhopper.

name: Fish Costume
description: Don't give me that look... said the penguin. It's just a costume. I'm trying to get a part in a play at the Stage, and I need expert advice. Now are you going to help me or not?

name: Crow's Nest
description: Yarr's favorite place on the Migrator is up in the Crow's Net. You can see for miles, and take out any rogue icebergs with the ship's snowball cannon.

name: Cove
description: Other penguins like to come to the Cove to surf, but I just love to gaze out at the water. I was the first one to spot a huge storm one time through the binoculars! The ocean can tell you a lot.

name: his key
description: Rockhopper used to keep his quarters locked, the tour guide says. But now you just need to find his key to get in...

name: Iceberg
description: If we tipped this over, what do you think we'd find on the other side? one penguin inquires. It's the biggest mystery of all, they replied. We've got to find a way to tip it.
The Lounge is located upstairs from the Night Club, and it's the perfect place to chill and play arcade games. Can you master the tricky Thin Ice or pilot the Astro Barrier to victory?

name: Penguins That Time Forgot
description: Dinosaurs, lava, time-traveling... this was one of my favorite plays, she explained. Watch this, I'll be a cave penguin... 'GRUB! FIRE ROAST MARSHMALLOW!'

name: Team Blue Rally
description: Rallying at the Stage for epic competitions, the Red Team and Blue Team wrote another chapter of their rivalry with the introduction of their moose mascots.

For those looking to experience the thrill of flying, look no further than Jet Pack Adventure, said the Tour Guide. Just head to the top of the Lighthouse, strap on a pack, and take off! Parachutes provided!
Snowballs can be used for all types of purposes, from snowball fights to tennis matches. I like to throw rapid-fire by hitting 'T' on my keyboard constantly. TURBO THROW!

name: Music Jam
description: I love a good music festival, he responded. Music Jam 2008 was probably my favorite party. I finally got to meet Penguin Band, and DJ3K came out for the first time!

name: scratching post
description: My black puffle just loves the scratching post I bought him from the Pet Shop. But I can't figure out why he keeps trying to eat it! Maybe I need to feed him some Puffle O's.

name: Jelly Fish
description: These rare Antarctic jelly fish can produce a small electric charge that can make for a 'shocking' experience for Ice Fishing experts who may snag one on their line.
Arr! Only the bravest penguins join me pirate crew! says Rockhopper. Smartly now, sailors where be yer sea flippers?
The fish around Club Penguin won't just up and eat and old bait. In fact, each kind of fish has their own favorite food. Fishing experts recommend trying different types of bait for best results.

name: Hydro Hopper
description: Catchin' a ride on the ol' Hydro Hopper at the Dock is sweet, the Tour Guide explained. Catching air and sailing over obstacles is not only fun, but will earn you extra coins. Come on, give it a try!

name: Puffle Handler
description: Though puffles enjoy cookies, and a stick of gum now and then, their favorite food is Puffle O's, without a doubt, said the Puffle Handler. Make sure not to overfeed them though, because they might get a tummy ache.

name: Fall Fair
description: Once a year the Fall Fair comes to Club Penguin with a whole bunch of special games, said the Tour Guide. These games award tickets you can trade for sweet prizes. And I mean 'sweet.' Their cotton candy is delicious!

name: Thinga-ma-jig 3000
description: Oh, you've heard of the Thing-ma-jig 3000? Gary asked. Oh yes, it's quite a clever little device, but it's hidden away in my Gadget Room. It's so well hidden in that you'd have to be some kind of secret agent to find it.

name: Quip and Qua
description: Truly we are the most bizarre costumes that can be purchased from the Stage... scoffed Qua. I don't know... answered Quip. I saw a squid monster with a sheep face walking around. Well, replies Qua, other than that guy...

name: Twee
description: The fairy storyteller from the Fairy Fables play at the Stage. Twee loves to mix things up to keep it fresh from colors to stories, things are never quite ordinary in her library!

name: Coins For Change
description: They say it's better to give than to receive and that's totally tree with Coins for Change. There's always amazing amounts of generosity when penguins decide to change the world! Waddle around and make difference!
And I was like, woah, it's a shark! And it was like 'RAH!' and then I was like whoa, it's a shark! And you shoulda seen it man. I mean, it was huge it was mahoosive!

name: Dance Contest
description: Any penguin brave enough to stand up, talk the talk, walk the walk, and bust out their icy best moves is an epic win here in the Dance Club.

name: Purple Octopus
description: What's wackier than an octopus showing up in the middle of a party? Nothing! That's epic wacky! This inflatable octopus tends to show up at the strangest of times, so keep your eyes open for other appearances!

name: Giant Squid
description: I'm telling you, the Squid is totally real. I was deep below the Iceberg in the Aqua Grabber one day when it went zipping past me going 'EAAAUUUUURGGGGH!'. We need to find it!

name: Camera
description: This item is sometimes found in the Costume Trunk at the Stage. Once you have a camera, wave to snap award-winning photos all over the island.
Be a chef! Make pizzas in the Pizzatron 3000 game in the kitchen. Put on your red apron and dance to serve customers in the restaurant.

name: Coffee Machine
description: Secret Agents will find this machine in the Coffee Shop during the Secret of the Fur mission. It will help you save the island.

name: Stompin' Bob
description: The laid back bass player of Penguin Band. He keeps the beat with bandmate G Billy and loves to play the jazzy stuff.

name: G Billy
description: The founder of and drummer for Penguin Band. If you ever get the chance to meet him Backstage during Music Jam be sure to get an autographed background by clicking his player card!

name: Ticket Booth
description: You never know who will sell you a ticket for the latest Stage performance at the Plaza. Sometimes actors man the booth between shows!
It's the toughest Sled Racing run on the Ski Hill. Up to four penguins can race together, so if you're serious about challenging your buddies, this is the way to do it!

name: Clock Tower
description: Ready, set, throw snow! Find this snowball-powered clock in the Snow Forts. Throw snowballs at the target to help keep it powered. Just press T on your keyboard and click the red target!

name: White Puffles
description: First discovered in February '09, these critters are known to be gentle but powerful. Adopt one from the Pet Shop and discover what it can turn to ice with a single breath!

name: Dojo Courtyard
description: This is the outside of the Dojo and it was uncovered by penguins in November 2008. To get here, you must use your map.
This ginormous rocking horse somehow found itself upstairs in the Lodge Attic. To see it for yourself, go to the Ski Village and climb the ladder inside the Ski Lodge.
There's new stuff in this catalog every month! Why not get your friends together in the Gift Shop and check it out? Pick out new outfits, then hold a fashion show in your igloo!

Directors needed! Located in the Plaza, the Stage has new plays every month and always needs actors, stagehands, and even directors to make every performance a success. Grab a costume from the catalog and break a leg!
From the top of the Lighthouse, you can look through the telescope to see if there's sign of Rockhopper's ship or play the game Jet Pack Adventure.

name: the room with the best beats
description: There's two secret passages to the underground. You'll find this one in the Plaza. To find the other passage, head to the room with the best beats and pay attention to the speaker on the far right.

name: Franky
description: This cool lead guitarist of Penguin Band loves to hang out with other music fans around the island. Find him with his bandmates Backstage during Music Jam and receive an autographed background.

name: Petey K
description: The talented pianist and accordion player in the Penguin Band. He's always bursting with new song ideas and loves to share them with audiences around the island.

name: Boombox
description: Penguins learned a new dance with this item when Cadence showed up with it during a party in the Night Club. If you have the item, wear it and press D on your keyboard and see what you can do!

name: dimensions
description: It's a celebration where things happen that can't happen! Discover the wacky and unexpected with friends across the island at this party from surprise-filled boxes to new dimensions!

name: Cowbell
description: First available at the Music Jam '09 party, this item is still a hit across the island! To join in the fun, press D on your keyboard while wearing the item.
Puffles love them and it's a good thing too! When they get hungry it's the best meal to recharge their energy. O'Berries grow in the wild and are always in full supply on your puffle's player card.

name: 101 Days of Fun
description: There's always a lot to discover around the island and in 2009, for 101 days straight, penguins had fun completing a new activity every day!
Holiday spirit takes over the island during this party! This is the Photo Booth in the Forest where penguins posed for pictures with Santa.

name: Viking Opera
description: Be part of this popular Stage show, as a detective, ghost, or even the Viking Opera singer. Put on the Viking wig and dance, following along to the script.

name: Water Party
description: Most penguins have had a snowball fight at the Snow Forts. But at the Water Party, the splat of water balloons replacing the thud of snow. Too cool!

name: Tuba
description: At the Music Jam '09 party, this item was popular at the Lighthouse stage. When you wore it and danced, you could even hear it playing!

name: Adventure Party
description: During this June 2009 party, after Rockhopper's plants took over the island, penguin explorers discovered rare flowers some that changed colors and others that liked to eat snowballs!

name: Penguin Play Awards
description: Penguins called this one of 2009's coolest events. They voted for their favorite stage plays, got to meet Penguin Band and Aunt Arctic, and enjoyed dressing up to receive their own awards!

name: All-Access Pass
description: During Music Jam '09 party, this pass got penguins into the Backstage and Night Club Rooftop where they hung out with friends and had a chance to meet Penguin Band and Cadence.

name: Cadence's Autograph
description: Cadence is a very popular penguin around here! She makes appearances at big events like the Penguin Play Awards. You can meet her and receive an autographed background by clicking her player card.

name: Treasure Book
description: This book contains the best collection of rare and exclusive items. Look for a code with select toys and enter at clubpenguin.com to gain access to this special catalog.
Penguins flew for the first time when they danced while wearing this item at the 2006 April Fool's Day Party. Penguins aren't the only ones who like these caps though check out the green puffles!
One of the island's best kept secrets. Make Dessert Pizza in the Pizza Parlor's Pizzatron 3000 game by clicking on the lever of the machine when you enter the game!
Fire. Snow. Water. That's what you'll need to master the Card-Jitsu game. Train with your friends and Sensei at the Dojo to earn belts and become a ninja.

name: Elite Penguin Force
description: This super-secret agency has one goal: to protect the Club Pengun island. Their base, the Command Room, is hidden near the Ski Village.
